chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
m: nat
n: nat
p: m <= n

Goal:
PrimRecs n m

Premises:
Inductive PrimRec : nat -> Set := succFunc : PrimRec 1 | zeroFunc : PrimRec 0 | projFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> PrimRec n | composeFunc : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> PrimRec m -> PrimRec n | primRecFunc : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRec (S (S n)) -> PrimRec (S n) with PrimRecs : nat -> nat -> Set := PRnil : forall n : nat, PrimRecs n 0 | PRcons : forall n m : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRecs n m -> PrimRecs n (S m) Arguments PrimRec _%nat_scope Arguments projFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments composeFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRecFunc _%nat_scope Arguments PrimRecs (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments PRnil _%nat_scope Arguments PRcons (_ _)%nat_scope
PRcons : forall n m : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRecs n m -> PrimRecs n (S m)
Inductive PrimRec : nat -> Set := succFunc : PrimRec 1 | zeroFunc : PrimRec 0 | projFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> PrimRec n | composeFunc : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> PrimRec m -> PrimRec n | primRecFunc : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRec (S (S n)) -> PrimRec (S n) with PrimRecs : nat -> nat -> Set := PRnil : forall n : nat, PrimRecs n 0 | PRcons : forall n m : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRecs n m -> PrimRecs n (S m) Arguments PrimRec _%nat_scope Arguments projFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments composeFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRecFunc _%nat_scope Arguments PrimRecs (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments PRnil _%nat_scope Arguments PRcons (_ _)%nat_scope
composeFunc : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> PrimRec m -> PrimRec n
evalPrimRecs : forall n m : nat, PrimRecs n m -> Vector.t (naryFunc n) m
PrimRecs_ind : forall P : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n 0 (PRnil n)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (p : PrimRec n) (p0 : PrimRecs n m), P n m p0 -> P n (S m) (PRcons n m p p0)) -> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P n n0 p
PrimRecs_rect : forall P : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n 0 (PRnil n)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (p : PrimRec n) (p0 : PrimRecs n m), P n m p0 -> P n (S m) (PRcons n m p p0)) -> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P n n0 p
PrimRecs_sind : forall P : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P n 0 (PRnil n)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (p : PrimRec n) (p0 : PrimRecs n m), P n m p0 -> P n (S m) (PRcons n m p p0)) -> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P n n0 p
PrimRecs_rec : forall P : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set, (forall n : nat, P n 0 (PRnil n)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (p : PrimRec n) (p0 : PrimRecs n m), P n m p0 -> P n (S m) (PRcons n m p p0)) -> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P n n0 p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
PRnil : forall n : nat, PrimRecs n 0
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
PrimRec_PrimRecs_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_PrimRecs_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
gt = fun n m : nat => m < n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gt (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.Even = fun n : nat => exists m : nat, n = 2 * m : nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Even _%nat_scope
VectorDef.take : forall p0 : nat, p0 <= ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A p0 where ?A : [n : nat m : nat p : m <= n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : m <= n |- nat]
VectorSpec.take_O : forall (le : 0 <= ?n) (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), VectorDef.take 0 le v = VectorDef.nil ?A where ?A : [n : nat m : nat p : m <= n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : m <= n |- nat]
Nat.Odd = fun n : nat => exists m : nat, n = 2 * m + 1 : nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Odd _%nat_scope
Nat.A'A_right : forall (A : nat -> Prop) (z : nat), (forall n m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
Nat.le_ind : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : nat, A n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> A m -> A (S m)) -> forall m : nat, n <= m -> A m
Init.Nat.pow = fix pow (n m : nat) {struct m} : nat := match m with | 0 => 1 | S m0 => n * pow n m0 end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pow (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.max = fix max (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n' => match m with | 0 => n | S m' => S (max n' m') end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.max (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.max_spec : forall n m : nat, n < m /\ Nat.max n m = m \/ m <= n /\ Nat.max n m = n
PrimRec_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Type, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> SProp, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
Nat.rs'_rs'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < S n -> A m)
Nat.le_antisymm : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m <= n -> n = m
Nat.square_le_mono_nonneg : forall n m : nat, 0 <= n -> n <= m -> n * n <= m * m
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
le_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), P n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> P m -> P (S m)) -> forall n0 : nat, n <= n0 -> P n0
Nat.divide_antisym_nonneg : forall n m : nat, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> Nat.divide n m -> Nat.divide m n -> n = m
Nat.sub_add : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m - n + n = m
Nat.lt_eq_cases : forall n m : nat, n <= m < -> n < m \/ n = m
Nat.strong_right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
Nat.square_lt_simpl_nonneg : forall n m : nat, 0 <= m -> n * n < m * m -> n < m

```coq
induction p.
- apply PRnil.
- apply PRcons.
  + apply projFunc.
    * apply le_lt_trans with (m := S n); auto.
  + apply IHp.
Qed. 
Qed.```

original: induction p. - apply PRnil. - apply PRcons. + apply projFunc. * apply le_lt_trans with (m := S n); auto. + apply IHp.
